CreateEvent.name: CreateEvent
CreateEvent.description: Grants permission to create a BugBust event

EvaluateProfilingGroups.name: EvaluateProfilingGroups
EvaluateProfilingGroups.description: Grants permission to evaluate checked-in profiling groups

GetEvent.name: GetEvent
GetEvent.description: Grants permission to view customer details about an event

GetJoinEventStatus.name: GetJoinEventStatus
GetJoinEventStatus.description:
Grants permission to view the status of a BugBust player's attempt to join a BugBust
                                                event

JoinEvent.name: JoinEvent
JoinEvent.description: Grants permission to join an event

ListBugs.name: ListBugs
ListBugs.description:
Grants permission to view the bugs that were imported into an event for players to
                                                work on

ListEventParticipants.name: ListEventParticipants
ListEventParticipants.description: Grants permission to view the participants of an event

ListEventScores.name: ListEventScores
ListEventScores.description: Grants permission to view the scores of an event's players

ListEvents.name: ListEvents
ListEvents.description: Grants permission to List BugBust events

ListProfilingGroups.name: ListProfilingGroups
ListProfilingGroups.description:
Grants permission to view the profiling groups that were imported into an event for
                                                players to work on

ListPullRequests.name: ListPullRequests
ListPullRequests.description:
Grants permission to view the pull requests used by players to submit fixes to their
                                                claimed bugs in an event

UpdateEvent.name: UpdateEvent
UpdateEvent.description: Grants permission to update a BugBust event
UpdateEvent.dependentActions:
codeguru-profiler:DescribeProfilingGroup
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-profiler:ListProfilingGroups
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-reviewer:DescribeCodeReview
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-reviewer:ListCodeReviews
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-reviewer:ListRecommendations
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-reviewer:TagResource
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   codeguru-reviewer:UnTagResource

UpdateWorkItem.name: UpdateWorkItem
UpdateWorkItem.description:
Grants permission to update a work item as claimed or unclaimed (bug or profiling
                                                group)

UpdateWorkItemAdmin.name: UpdateWorkItemAdmin
UpdateWorkItemAdmin.description: Grants permission to update an event's work item (bug or profiling group)
